item.title: By: Bradley Ball (@SQLBalls)

item.content:encoded:
Hi Jes! Thanks so much for contributing! Great blog! Every year without fail I look back and how much more I know than I did the year before.

That cluster story brings back some memories for me as well, we were all green at one point:)
